welcome_message_body: Welcome to Chesapeake, where the beautiful waterways and historic charm await you. Known for its scenic beauty and rich history, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Burrito Perdido
restaurants.description: Burrito Perdido is a burrito restaurant located in Chesapeake.

restaurants.name: Mikado Sushi and Thai
restaurants.description: Mikado Sushi and Thai is a sushi restaurant located in Chesapeake.

restaurants.description: Andrea's Pizzaria & Italian is a pizzeria located in Chesapeake.

restaurants.name: Village Inn
restaurants.description: Village Inn is a american restaurant located in Chesapeake.

restaurants.name: Chick-fil-A
restaurants.description: Chick-fil-A is a fast food restaurant located in Chesapeake.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lawrence County Airpark Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network while waiting for their flight.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Norfolk International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Norfolk International Airport is primarily used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Norfolk International Airport is primarily used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at NAS Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Elizabeth City Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Elizabeth City Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.
